BUA KULONGA:
Bala Bible ne mvese wa ku dituku
Bala mukanda wa Annuaire, bibejibeji, ne mikanda yetu mikuabu. Teka kamanyinu miaba iudi mubale
Longolola bisangilu bia tshisumbu, wele mishonyi pa mandamuna
Tangila filme
MU BISANGILU:
Bala mvese idi ngamba-malu wamba bua kubala. Tuta pa tshitupa tshia malu aukavua mubale bua kupetulula mvese
Pamutu pa kuya ne mikanda ya bungi mu bisangilu, angata telefone anyi tablete webe bua kulondesha bitupa bishilashilangane ne kuimba misambu. Mu JW Library mudi misambu mipiamipia idi kayiyi mianji kuikala mu mukanda wa misambu
MU BUAMBI:
Leja muntu udi witaba bulelela bualu kampanda mu JW Library, pashishe umuleje mua kuambula programe eu ne mikanda yetu, kubiela mu telefone anyi mu tablete wende
Buela muaba wa dikebela bua kupeta mvese. Tshiambilu kampanda tshiotshi katshiyi mu Nkudimuinu wa bulongolodi bupiabupia muakajilula (Angl.), udi mua kuya mu Bible avec notes et références bua kukebamu kabidi
Muleja filme. Bikalaye ne bana, udi mua kuela filme umue wa Ikala mulunda wa Yehowa, anyi kumuleja filme wa Bua tshinyi kulonga Bible? bua apete dijinga dia kulonga Bible. Yeye wakula muakulu mukuabu, umuleje filme mu muakulu wende
Leja muntu mvese mu muakulu mukuabu mu Bible uukavua muambule mu tshiamua tshiebe. Buela muaba udi mvese, utute pa nomba wa mvese, pashishe tuta pa kamanyinu kadi kaleja nkudimuinu mikuabu

Becky wa mu Californie mu États-Unis udi wamba ne: “Mvua mumanye Mike kukadi bidimu bia bungi. Utu Ntemu wa Yehowa. Kadi tshitendelelu tshiende tshivua misangu ya bungi tshimpitshila. Yehowa nnganyi? Bua tshinyi Bantemu kabatu basekelela matuku a mifikilu? Mike uvua mubuelakane mu malu a tshisumbu kampanda anyi?”
Zenon wa mu Ontario mu Canada udi wamba ne: “Pavua bena mutumba banyi batuadije kulonga Bible ne Bantemu ba Yehowa, ngakadiebeja ne: ‘dîna Bantemu ba Yehowa didi diumvuija tshinyi? Ndîn
... 
 mmalu kayi adibu bitabuja to.”
Pamuapa ukadi mubamone bayisha ku nzubu ne ku nzubu anyi mu bisalu benda babanya mikanda idi yumvuija Bible ne balongesha bantu ku mbanza yabu kabayi balomba makuta. Bobu ke badi mua kuikala bakupeshe tshibejibeji etshi. Pamuapa udi mua kudiebeja ne: Bantemu ba Yehowa mbanganyi menemene. Misangu mikuabu ngelelu webe wa meji udi mua kuikala mufuanangane ne wa bantu badibu batele kuulu eku.
Biwikale udiela nkonko ya mushindu eu, nkuepi kuudi mua kupetela mandamuna? 
...
emu ba Yehowa.” Kadi pakapita matuku, kuyukilaye ne Bantemu ba Yehowa buludiludi, kuandamunabu nkonko yende bimpe menemene.
Udiku musue kupeta mandamuna malelela ku nkonko yebe pa bidi bitangila Bantemu ba Yehowa anyi? Tudi tukulomba bua kukeba mandamuna anu kudi bena bualu nkayabu, mmumue ne: Bantemu ba Yehowa badi bapatule tshibejibeji etshi. (Nsumuinu 14:15) Tudi tuela meji ne: tshiena-bualu tshidi tshilonda netshikuambuluishe bua kumanya tshitudi, malu atudi tuitabuja ne mudimu utudi tuenza.

KU TSHIDIMU tshionso bantu bapite pa miliyo 6 batu benza ngendu baya kule mu diitu dia cedar mu tshidila tshia Shima mu Japon. Baya mu muaba munene wa tshijila wa Ise, muvuabu bantendelela Shinto nzambi mukaji dîba (Amaterasu Omikami) kukadi mpindieu bidmu bitue ku 2000. Batendeledi aba batu banji kudikezula pa kuowa bianza ne kusampulula mukana. Pashishe bimana kumpala kua muaba wa tshijila wa haiden (Tshimanu tshia kutendelela), batuadija kuenza malu abu a pa tshibidilu a kuinama, kututa bikas
... 
.” (Yone 4:23) Mu nkatshi mua bidimu bia bungi, bena Yuda bavua bamona ntempelo muimpe mutambe wa mu Yulushalema eu bu muaba wabu munene wa kutendelela. Bavua bayaku misangu isatu ku tshidimu bua kulambula Nzambi wabu Yehowa milambu. (Ekesode 23:14-17) Kadi Yezu wakamba ne: malu onso aa avua ne bua kushintuluka, kuambaye kabidi ne: “batendeledi balelela” bavua ne bua kutendelela “mu nyuma ne mu bulelela.”
Ntempelo wa bena Yuda uvua umueneka bimpe ne mu muaba musunguluke. Kadi nyuma ne bulelela k
...
 kuena ne bua kuya mu muaba kampanda wa tshijila wela meji ne: Nzambi udi mua kuteleja masambila ebe muaba au to. Nzambi mene kakukuanyisha anyi kukupesha mabenesha a pa buawu bua muudi muye mu muaba wa tshijila to. Bible udi utuambila ne: Yehowa Nzambi “Mukalenge wa diulu ne buloba, kena usombela mu ntempelo mienza ne bianza to.” Kadi bualu ebu kabuena buvuija Nzambi kula netu to. Tudi mua kumusambila ne neatuteleje nansha tuetu muaba kayi bualu ‘kena kule ne yonso wa kutudi’—Bienzedi 17:24-27.

Diabolo nnganyi?
UDI MUA KUANDAMUNA ne:
Mmuntu wa mubidi wa nyuma anyi?
Mbubi kampanda budi munda mua muntu anyi?
Ntshipeta tshia ngelelu wa meji wa bantu anyi?
TSHIDI BIBLE WAMBA
Diabolo wakayukila ne Yezu ne “kumutetaye.” (Matayi 4:1-4) Nunku Diabolo ki ntshintu kampanda tshia mu lungenyi anyi bubi kampanda to. Mmuntu mubi udi ne mubidi wa nyuma.
MMALU KAYI MAKUABU ATUDI MUA KULONGA MU BIBLE?
Ku tshibangidilu Diabolo uvua muanjelu muimpe, kadi “kakimana mu bulelela” to. (Yone 8:44) Wakalua muena mashimi ne kutombokelaye Nzambi.
Banjelu bakuabu bakalonda Satana mu buntombonji buende.—Buakabuluibua 12:9.
Diabolo mmufofomije mêsu a bantu ba bungi bua kabamanyi ne utuku to.—2 Kolinto 4:4.
Diabolo udi mua kulombola bantu anyi?
BAMUE BANTU BADI BAMBA NE: kuamba ne: Satana ke udi utulombola ndishima, eku bakuabu pabu bumvua buôwa bua kulombodibue kudi nyuma mibi. Wewe udi wela meji kayi?
TSHIDI BIBLE WAMBA
“Ba pa buloba bonso badi ku bukokeshi bua mubi.” (1 Yone 5:19) Diabolo udi ne buenzeji bua bungi kudi bantu bonso, kadi kena ulombola muntu yonso to.
MMALU KAYI MAKUABU ATUDI MUA KULONGA MU BIBLE?
Bua kukolesha buenzeji buende Diabola utu usaka bantu bua kushimangana.—2 Kolinto 11:14.
Nyuma mibi itu imue misangu ilombola bantu.—Matayi 12:22.
Ku diambuluisha dia Nzambi, udi mua “kukandamena Diabolo” bimpe.—Yakobo 4:7.

Nkoko ya shapita eu, yabungi idi ilonda Mukanda wa bena Lomo 1 ne ku 5. 11. Shapita udi ulonda, udi utangila Lomo 5. 12-8.
5.1 Muaku "Evangile" (lumu luimpe) udi unvuija tshinyi?
Muaku "Evanvile" Utudi tukudimuna mu tshiluba "lumu luimpe", mu tshiena Gelika udi unvuija "bonne nouvelle"= "mukenji mulenga= lumuluimpe". Pavua tshiluilu tshia nvita tshitshimuna nvita, mumanyishi wa lumu uvua utumibua kumpala kuabu mu musoko, pavuaye useme
... 
uja" kudi kusua kuamba ne, tudi tudifila mu Kilisto wakafuta mushinga bua malu mabi etu, ne bajadike ne mushinga eu udi mukumbane. "Ku ngasa" kudi kusua kunvuija ne tudi anu ne bua kuitabuja ne kuakidila mudimu wakenza Nzambi, ne tuetu katuena mua kuenza mukuabu.
Mushindu udi Nzambi muenze bua kutubingisha, mmashi a Kilisto, ke bua tshinyi tshiambilu etshi ne "ku ditabuja dia mu mashi andi", Mukelenge Yesu wakitabuja lufu pa muaba wetu.

ikibua, ne ditekemena. Luse lua Nzambi luakitshikishibua mu mitshima yetu kudi Nyuma Muimpe. Luse elu (dinanga) Nzambi wakabileja kutudi pakafua Kilisto ku mutshi mutshiamakane - patuakadi bantu babi.
Tshikoso: Bikala Nzambi wakamana kuenza ne kufila biabungi bua bualu buetu patuakadi bena lukuna, mushintu kayi mpindieu patudi ne tshibueledi kumpala kuende ne balengejibue nandi, neatusungile mu ntatu yetu ya matuku onso a muoyo wetu pa buloba, ne neatusungile ku tshiji tshilualua. Bujadiki kayi!

DORINE uvua mumvue bibi menemene pavuabu bakuate bayende Willy, uvua anu ne bidimu 54, ne tshiwuja mu buongo tshivua tshidiunda lukasa. * Baminganga bavua bamuambile ne: kuvua kumushadile anu ngondo mikese. Dorine udi uvuluka wamba ne: “Bivua binkolele bua kuitaba tshimvua mumvue. Munkatshi mua mbingu ya bungi tshivua ndiumvua bu meme to. Bivua anu bu ne: bivua bienzekela muntu mukuabu, kabiyi bituenzekela tuetu to. Tshivua mumanye ne: bualu bua mushindu eu buvua mua kutufikila to.”
Bia dibungam
... 
badi benzejibue bua kuangatshila mubedi wabu udi kayi ne mushindu wa kuakula mapangadika. Kulejangana malu patoke kumpala kua dîba kudi kuambuluisha bena mu dîku bua kuimanyina pa mushindu wa kulama mubedi. Bible udi wamba ne: “Malu malongolola adi apangila padiku kakuyi dishintakaja dia ngenyi.”—Nsumuinu 15:22, NWT.
TSHIA KUENZA BUA KUAMBULUISHA
Mudimu wa kumpala wa muntu udi ulama mubedi ngua kumukolesha. Muntu ukadi pa kufua mmusue bamujadikile ne: mbamunange ne kena nkayende to. Mmunyi mutud
...
tu, udi umvua mudibi bitusama ne bitunyingalaja. Udi ne bukole bua kutuambuluisha ne kutukankamija bua tutantamene lutatu luetu ne mmusue kuenza nanku. Kadi bualu budi butamba kusankisha mbua ne: mmulaye bua kumbusha lufu mu katupa kîpi emu bua kashidi ne bua kubisha bantu miliyo ne miliyo badi mu meji ende ku lufu. (Yone 5:28, 29; Buakabuluibua 21:3, 4) Dîba adi, bantu bonso nebambe mêyi a mupostolo Paulo a ne: “Lufu, ditshimuna diebe didi penyi? Lufu, kalonda kebe kadi penyi?”—1 Kolinto 15:55.

Mmushindu kayi uvuabu benza mivungu ne benza nayi mudimu mu bikondo bivuabu bafunda Bible?
Evangeliyo wa Luka udi wamba ne: Yezu wakavungulula muvungu wa Yeshaya, kuubala ne pashishe kuuvunga. Ku ndekelu kua evangeliyo wa Yone, wakakula bua muvungu wamba ne: kavua mukumbane bua kufundamu bimanyinu bionso bivua Yezu muenze to.— Luka 4:16-20; Yone 20:30; 21:25.
Mmushindu kayi uvuabu benza mivungu? Bavua bangata bintu bu mudi biseba bia nyama (anyi parchemin), peshi papirise babilamakaja ne budimbu
... 
, kakuyi bintu bikuabu bishala to.” (The Anchor Bible Dictionary) Tshilejilu, badi batshinka ne: evangeliyo wa Luka uvua ukengela muvungu wa metre matue ku 9,5 mu bule. Misangu mikuabu, bavua bapempa ku mielelu ya muvungu, bayipela ne dibue ne bayitua mu mâyi a mêkala.
“Bamfumu ba bakuidi” badibu bakuila mu Mifundu ya bena Kristo ya mu tshiena Greke bavua mua kuikala banganyi?
Katshia batuadija kuteka bakuidi mu Isalele, bavua bateka anu muntu umue bua ikale muakuidi munene, anu mudimu eu ke uvu
...
 basue. Kadi bidi bimueneka ne: bantu bapiabapia bavuabu basungula bavua babasungula misangu ya bungi mu mêku a bantu bavua ne diakalenga edi, nangananga mu ndelanganyi ya Alona. Tshiambilu tshia “bamfumu ba bakuidi” tshidi pamuapa tshileja bantu banene ba mu kasumbu ka bakuidi. Mu bamfumu ba bakuidi muvua balombodi ba tusumbu 24 tua bakuidi; bantu banene ba mu mêku a bakuidi banene; bakuidi banene ba kale bavuabu bumbushe, bu mudi Ana.—1 Kulondolola 24:1-19; Matayi 2:4; Mâko 8:31; Bienzedi 4:6.

ena didi disankisha dia dibika dia bafue. (1 Tes. 4:13) Bua dinanga, Yehowa Nzambi mmuindile ne muoyo mujima bua kubisha bafue, nangananga aba badi ne lulamatu bu mudi muntu muakane Yobo. 22. Ndinanga dia mushindu kayi dituamona mu tshiena-bualu tshidi tshilonda?
22 Yezu wakamba ne: tudi ne bua kunanga Nzambi ne kunanga kabidi muntu netu. (Mat. 22:37-39) Anu mutuamona patuakonkonona kabidi ngikadilu eu, dinanga dietu kudi Yehowa ne mikenji yende nedituambuluishe bua kusomba bimpe ne bantu netu ne kubaleja dinanga dia buwetu.

MABEJI A TSHISANGILU TSHIA NSOMBELU NE MUDIMU WETU WA BUENA KRISTO Ngondo 3 2017
Tshia kuamba bua kufila tshibejibeji tshia Tshibumba tshia Nsentedi ne kulongesha bulelela budi butangila tshimanyinu tshia matuku a ku nshikidilu. Enza mudimu ne bilejilu ebi bua kukeba tshiebe tshia kuamba.
BIUMA BIA MU DÎYI DIA NZAMBI
Bena Isalele bavua bela meji ne: milambu ivuabu bapesha Yehowa pa tshibidilu ivua mua kumusaka bua kubabuikidila malu mabi avuabu benza. Yelemiya wakela mpekatu ya bena Isalele ne lubombo luabu patoke ne dikima dionso.
TUIKALAYI NE NSOMBELU WA BUENA KRISTO

MÊYI A MU BIBLE: “Nutungunuke ne kufuilangana luse ne muoyo mujima nansha muntu yeye muikale tshilumbu ne mukuabu. Anu bu mudi Yehowa munufuile luse ne muoyo mujima, nudi ne bua kuenza penu nanku.”—Kolosayi 3:13.
Bidi biumvuija tshinyi? Mu Bible badi bafuanyikija bubi ne dibanza, difuilangana luse badi badifuanyikija ne kulekeelangana dibanza. (Luka 11:4) Tshikandakanda kampanda tshidi tshiamba ne: mu Mifundu, muaku wa tshiena Greke udibu bakudimune ne: “kufuilangana luse” udi umvuija “kulekeela
... 
alu abu butukebele to. Kadi tudi basue amu kubukupula ku muoyo, nansha koku bualu budi buenza bua ‘tuikale tshilumbu’ ne muntu.
Bidiku mua kuenzeka nanku lelu anyi? Bu mutudi bantu bena mapanga, tutu tuenza bonso bibi. (Lomo 3:23) Nunku, mbimpe kuikala ne lungenyi lua kufuila bakuabu luse, bualu nansha ku tototo nansha ku ndandanda netujinge bua bakuabu batufuile petu luse. Kabidi tuetu ne lungenyi lua kufuilangana luse nebituambuluishe tuetu bine. Mushindu kayi?
Tuetu balame tshiji ne lukuna ka
...
ja mudi tshiji ne kulaminangana lukuna munda kupetesha disama dia muoyo.”—Journal of the American College of Cardiology.
Kadi, tangila malu mimpe atudi tupeta patudi tufuila bantu luse. Tuetu tufuila bantu luse ne muoyo mujima tudi tulama buobumue ne ditalala, tudi kabidi tulama bimpe malanda etu ne bakuabu. Kadi bualu bua mushinga bunene mbua ne: tudi tuidikija Nzambi utu ubuikidila ne muoyo mujima benji ba mibi badi banyingalala; utu utulomba petu bua kuenza nanku.—Mâko 11:25; Efeso 4:32; 5:1.

Katshia anu ku kale, bantu batu bangata Nowele bu difesto dia bena Kristo, bua kusekelela diledibua dia Yezu. Kadi mikiya idibu benzamu idi itusaka bua kudiebeja bua tshinyi mbasuikakaje difesto edi ne diledibua dia Yezu.
Bumue bualu budi ne: bantu batu badifuikakajila muntu udibu babikila ne: pere Nowele. Pere Nowele wa lelu udi musangale ku mêsu, muikale ne muedi mutoke ne matama a bijengu, ntshimfuanyi tshia madisuisha tshivuabu benze kudi bena kumpanyi kampanda wa maluvu ku Amerike wa ku Nor
... 
 bu tshilele tshia bampankano, mbualu buvuabu babenga ne muoyo mujima. Mu bulelela, kakuena muaba nansha umue mu Bible udibu batele dituku divua Yezu muledibue.
Tshikandakanda kampanda tshidi tshiamba ne: nansha muvua bena Kristo babenga ne muoyo mujima tshilele tshia disekelela mifikilu ya diledibua, mu bidimu bia 300 Ekeleziya wa Katolike wakabueja difesto dia Nowele. Ekeleziya wakajinga bua kukolesha dipangadika edi pa kumbusha bintu bivua bibapangisha, mmumue ne: bitendelelu bia bampangano b
...
: Nowele “ndifesto dia bampangano divuadika tshimuenekelu tshia buena Kristo.” Nunku, difesto dia Nowele didi dipendeshisha Nzambi ne Muanende Yezu Kristo. Mbualu budi kabuyi anu ne mushinga menemene anyi? Bible udi webeja ne: “Mmalanda kayi adi pankatshi pa buakane ne dishipa dia mikenji? Anyi ndipetangana kayi didi pankatshi pa butoke ne mîdima?” (2 Kolinto 6:14) Anu mudi mutshi mukole wowu mumane kukonyangala, Nowele mmumane kukonyangala, ‘kakuyi mushindu wa kumululamija’ nansha.—Muambi 1:15.

Inoko, misoñanya ya bukundwe itambanga kudi Leza wetu ujila. (Div 30:18-20; Kup 23:14; 2Ko 7:1) Shi tudyangula nyeke umbidi wetu ne bintu byotudi nabyo, tutumbijanga Yehova. Tshikondo tshia manaya a CAN 2023: Nyunyi mupiamupia udi mumanyike
Mulongo wa bantu badi kabayi mu tshiluilu tshia Sébastien Desabre bua mvita ibidi idi pankatshi pa ditunga dia RDC ne dia Mauritanie udi utungunuka ne kukola.
Panyima pa dimanyisha dia dipanga dia Gédéon Kalulu, FECOFA udi mujadike bualu bukuabu. Muena mudimu eu uvua Pelly Ruddock. Mulunda wa munkatshi wa bidimu 28 wa Luton Town mu manaya (D2 wa mu Angleterre) kena mua kuleja mushinga wende kudi mulombodi mupiamupia kunyima kua disama mu disangila dia ku ndekelu kua lumingu lushale ne tshisumbu tshiende.
Bua kujikija dipanga edi, badi batekemene bua Samuel Bastien, muakuidi wa Burley (D2 mu Anglais) udi upingana pa muaba wa Pelly Mpanzu.
Tudi tuamba ne, dipetangana dia dibidi dia dundu wa manaya a CAN 2023 adi pankatshi pa ditunga dia RDC ne dia Mauritanie bua musangu Wa dinya ne nedikale mû Lubumbashe mu matuku makumi anayi ngongo muisatu eu ni ndundu Wa dipingana ne dikala mu tshipalu dia ditunga dia Mauritanie mû dia matuku makumi ni muanda mukulu.

Kadi, Charles Russell ne Balongi nende ba Bible bavua bapete tshintu tshia mushinga wa bungi, mmumue ne: bulelela bua mu Bible. Bavua bajinga kubuambila bantu bakuabu ne muoyo mujima.

... 
bimfuanyi ebi mu muaba kayi wonso.” Bushuwa ke muvuabi bienzeke.

Patrick Muyaya udi ufila tshikosu tsha ngumu ya ditunga
Mena momekela mianda ya dikobolola, Patrick Muyaya uvumwikala kumpala kua bakamona kamba kupitshila ku tshikosu tsha ngumu ya ditunga dia Kongu wa mungalata, mu matuku makumi abidi ne abidi, a ngondu wa dikumi ne umwe, tshidimu tshidi panshi etshi (mardi 22 novembre 2022).
Patrick Muyaya wa kumanyisha bwase Kavulambedi (premier ministre), Jean-Michel Sama ne bantu bonsu bavwa baleja mpala wa ditunga dia Kongu mmusangilu wa matunga masanga b
... 
kane wa bena Kongu, kuluseka lwa mianda ya mubidi.
Patrick Muyaya wakumanyisha kadi ne muyuki udimwikala wenzeka pakatshi a Kinshasa ne Monusco bwadiumbaka dienda mu ditunga dia Kongu. Bukubi bwa bantu ne bintu kuluseka lwa Nord-Kivu buvwa bwakwidibwa.
Patrick Muyaya wakumanyisha se mena momekela mianda ya bukubi bwa bantu ne bintu, yeya uvwa mwakwila ntunguluku wa majinda a Fardc kulwila ditunga dia Kongu. Mena momekela mianda ya ngikadilu mwakane wa bantu, wakuleja se 285.000 bantu (personnes)
...
i ne Luanda. Mena momekela mianda ya dikobolola, udi ulaya bwadi dimanyisha nyi dikala mwa kupatuka. Patrick Muyaya udi uleja se ditunga dia Kongu didi didibweja mu mianda ya nsombelu mwimpa pangatshi pa matunga. Ditunga dia Rwanda mbimpa dinemeka mapanganyika mangata mu muyuki yonsu. Patrick Muyaya wambi se tudi baswa kumona ntomboji ya M23 yumbuka mubulaba bwa Kongu.
Bwakujikija, Mena momekela mianda ya dikobolola wa kudimusha bena Kongu bwa badilama biakane ku tshipupu tsha Corona virus.

Matata Mpoyo Mapon, mulombodi wa tshisumbu tshia bena lukuna tshia Leadership and Governance for Development, wakela mukenji wa dikandika Moïse Katumbi bua kubenga kubuela mu provense wa Kongo central.
Muena Kongo wa kale udi wamba ne: bualu ebu budi butangila budikadidi bua Moïse Katumbi ne budi kabuyi bumvuangana ne mikenji ya ditunga ne kabuena mua kuanyishibua to.
“Ndi mufike ku dimona ne: mbanyishile Moïse Katumbi, udi musue kulua mulombodi wa ditunga bua kubuela mu ditunga dia Kongo. Ndi mmona dikandika dia budikadidi bua Mose edi bu didi dishilangana ne mikenji ya ditunga ne didi kadiyi dianyishibue. Dikengeshibua dia manême a bantu edi didi dipetangana ne dikokesha dia tshikisu”. Matata Mpoyo udi wamba mu twitter wende ne:
Bidi bikengela kumanya ne: Mukokeshi wa kale wa Katanga munene, uvua ne bua kuya mu Kongo wa pankatshi mu Disatu dia 23 ngondo muitanu bua luendu luende lua malu a tshididi.
Shekinah Gloire Kabongo

Netupetaku mbulamatadi wakokesha buloba bujima anyi?
Ela meji muikala mbulamatadi wa buloba bujima mua kuambuluisha bantu. Lelu eu bantu ba bungi badi bakenga bua bupele, eku bakuabu bikale babanji. Kadi mbulamatadi wa buloba bujima udi mumanye majinga a bantu udi mua kuenza bua bantu bonso bapete tshidibu natshi dijinga. Udiku wela meji ne: bantu badi mua kuenza mbulamatadi wa mushindu eu anyi?—Bala Yelemiya 10:23.
Kukadi bidimu bia bungi bidi mbulamatadi ya bantu mipangile mu mishindu yonso bua kukumbajila badiyi ilombola majinga abu, nangananga bapele. Imue mbulamatadi itu ne tshikisu tshia bungi. (Muambi 4:1; 8:9) Kadi Nzambi wa Bukole Buonso mmulaye bua kuteka mbulamatadi wapinganyina mbulamatadi ya bana ba bantu. Mukokeshi wa mbulamatadi eu neakumbajile bantu majinga abu.—Bala Yeshaya 11:4; Danyele 2:44.
Mmalu kayi enza Bukalenge bua Nzambi?
Yehowa Nzambi mmusungule Muanende Yezu, Mukokeshi muimpe wa buloba bujima. (Luka 1:31-33) Pavua Yezu pa buloba, uvua wambuluisha bantu bikole. Bu mudiye Mukalenge, neasangishe bantu ba mu bisamba bionso mu bobumue ne neumbushile bantu ntatu yonso.—Bala Musambu 72:8, 12-14.
Bantu bonso nebitabe Yezu bu Mukokeshi anyi? Tòo. Kadi Yehowa udi ne lutulu. (2 Petelo 3:9) Utshidi upesha bantu mpunga wa bobu kuitaba Yezu bu Mukokeshi. Mu katupa kîpi emu, Yezu neumbushe bantu babi pa buloba ne neafile ditalala ne bukubi pa buloba bujima.—Bala Mika 4:3, 4.

Mitshena aimuna uetshipaniti nete mishtikushiu-aimunit kie nete akaneshau-aimunit. Tshitauiashunan (emprunt) neni aimuna tshipa tshi issishuenan. Takuana neni aimuna anite tshinanu, muku nanikutini, apu tshissenitakuaki katshi utinakaniti nete ait aimunit, usham miam innu-aimuna eshi-pimipanitini.
Tshitapatamuku ume tipatshimuniss:
Atauitshuapit nika ituten tshishi-atusseiani, eukuan ume tshe ui itataueian : peikussimuteush napatata, meshishtit teshu (neshu), nishu natamata. Nui nashupitshen utakussiti mak nika nekaututshen.
Ume kutak ashit tshitapatamuku tipatshimuniss :
Akaneshau ui pushipan netupissa, ui natshi-pinakutsheu, nete nesseshepit metuenannu.
Umeni kutaka aimuna ka auiashunanuti : pushukateu, kapi, napien, papinaman…
Eukuan eshinakuak tshitaimunnan, eukuan eshi-pimipanit. Takuana kutaka aimuna ka utshipaniti nete mishtikushiu-aimunit mak passe akaneshau-aimunit, anutshish passe auiashunanua mak passe shashish neni takuana.
Kassinu anite aimuna eshi-aiminanuti assit, eukuan eshi-pimipaniti iapit, auiashuat kie uinuau ait aimunit nenua aimuna, mate ne mishtikushiu-aimun pacane, innu-aimunit utshipanu : pakan kie ne chicoutai, innu-aimunit iapit utshipanu : shikuteu.

Dipangadika dia CAF pas tshilumbu tshivua ditunga dia congo difila bua manaya ni ditunga dia Mauritanie didi dipatula bipatshila bisatu bia mu manaya adibu bapete mu Nouakchott. Ke bualu kayi banaya ba ndundu ya nyama wa nkashama badi bunbunka ku 7 too ne ku 9 point.
Tshisangilu tshia ndundu tshia mu ditunga dia Congo (FECOFA) tshidi tshienza mudimu mu malu a mu tshimuenekelu bua kupeta bipatshila bisatu bia ditshimuna dia ndundu kudi ditunga dia Mauritanie mu ngondo muisatu mushale, divua dijike ne tshipiminu tshia 1-1.
Tshisumbu tshia ndundu tshia mu ditunga dia Congo tshivua tshifile dilomba kudi tshisumbu tshia ndundu tshia mu Afrike (CAF), tshikale tshibenga ne: mulami wa ndundu Khadim Diaw uvua mupete ditunga dia Mauritanie kabayi batumikile mikenji. Bualu bukuabu, FECOFA uvua kabidi muele mpata bua karte kakunze kavua mulumbuluishi wa mu Tunisie muelele Cédric Bakambu.
Tshisumbu tshia ditunga dia congo ntshiangate anu bipatshila bisatu bia mushinga mukole bidi ne mushinga wa bungi mu manaya a CAN 2023 adi ne bua kuenzeka mu Côte d’Ivoire mu ngondo wa 1 wa tshidimu tshia 2024.

Ku fudilo mu Mikitshino ya batumibue: 1,14. Madiya batemunua bu mukashi a kubakashi babadi abatungunuka mu nteko na balongi, ta kui keneemo kimupebue nya.Mu kubunga kua binangu Madiya baadi na mbalo ya kukokola kua muabi na ta matalua na kineemo kimupebue nya. Kuteka nteko kui Madiya,biabia abilesha kulanguila kua nkishi. Bibuwa kulanguila Efile-Mukulu.

Mu Babele, Yehowa badi mupalakashe bantu babapele kukookyela paaye kufutakasha ndjimi yabo. Lelo uno Yehowa kwete kubunga miilo ya bantu ba bisamba bilekeene na ndjimi ilekeene bwa kwiyipa “ludimi lwi selele” “bwaidya kwidila ayo yooso eshina dya Yehowa, bwaidy’a kumufubila na katshintshi kaa mumune.” (Sef 3:9; Kibaf 7:9) Luno “ludimi lwi selele” nyi bya binyibinyi bya kwi Yehowa na milayilo yaaye bu byabidi bileshibwe mu Bible.
Kulonga ludimi lupya ntampenda kulamiina bishima byalo mu binangu nya akutekye myanda ibungi. Akutekye kulonga mushindo upya wa kwela binangu. Mu mushindo umune, pa tulongo ludimi lwi selele lwa bya binyibinyi, binangu byetu abishintuluka. (Lom 12:2) Abitekye kutungunuka na kukita bino, mwanda abikwashaa bafubi b’Efile Mukulu bwa kwikala mu buumune.—1Kod 1:10.

Lingua Franca Nova ("Elefen") mmuakulu muenza bua kuikala mupepele, mujalame ne mupepele bua kulonga bua kuyukila ne bantu ba miaba mikuabu. Udi ne ngikadilu muimpe wa bungi:
- Muakulu eu udi ne miaku mikese. Udi umvuika anu bu wa mu tshiena Italie anyi wa mu tshiena Espagne.
- Badi bafunda dîna edi bilondeshile miaku. Kakuena muana udi ne bua kupitshisha bidimu bia bungi ulonga maalu mabi too.
- Udi ne muakulu wa ku diakula ne wa ku diakula mu mushindu wa pa buawu, udi mufuanangane ne wa mu miakulu ya bena Créole ya buloba bujima.
- Udi ne biambilu bikese bidi biambuluisha bua kupatula miaku.
- Udi ne mikenji misunguluke ya mushindu wa kulondangana kua miaku, mu diumvuangana ne miakulu minene ya bungi.
- Miaku ya mu muakulu eu mmifumine bikole mu miakulu ya lelu idibu babikila ne: Romance. Miakulu eyi idi payi mmimuangalake bikole ne idi ne buenzeji, ne mmitupeshe tshitupa tshinene tshia miaku ya mu Anglais.
- Badi bamuenza bua kuitaba ne: miaku mipiamipia ya mu Latin ne ya mu tshiena Geelika(grecque ) idibu bakudimune mu miakulu mikuabu idi ne mushinga wa bungi, mmumue ne: "muanda wa buloba bujima".
- Mbenze bua muakulu eu umueneke bu "wa tshianana" kudi bantu badi bamanye miakulu ya bena Romance, kadi bantu bakuabu kabena mua kuumvua too.
Tudi batekemene ne: neunange Elefen!

Poem that Geneviève Bapuwa wrote as a funeral oration to her late husband.
Bapuwa Mwamba Kadiayi,
Bapuwa wa Tshimanga ne Mutombo
Mulela wa Kamwanya Tshiombo wa Lenga,
Kamwanya mukwa Nsumpi Tshibala wa ku Muuya.
Akaa!! Bapuwa wetu,
Tshikulumpe cya mubidi nzaka nyima dyobo,
Tshilobu cyanyi telejaku kanyi kaboobo,
Ndi nkubikila, mwena mutumba wanyi,
Lwaku tuya kwenu hambelu mu Kazaadi
Wewa udi mwena Mpuka,
Mpuka citonta muledi wa bakalenga
Kulela citokatooka e kulela ni nseki mwabi,
Mwena Tshilunda
... 
ba mulengele kumona, mwena mpala wa matengu,
Mwamba baya’a Kembia Mukwa Tshibuyi,
Diina diwunsaamunasamunwina,
Wewa ki bayanyi wa mu kabandu.
Baya’a Kembia Mukwanga Mukwa Tshimuna,
Mukwanga wa Ndeka wa mu Kabyula
Wa ku mu Mukaba Kwa Mpumbua Kazadi Wa kufwila mutooka ne muntuwa kaaji
Wa ku biitshikila biapaanga babooyi
Mushaala musoomba ne binsonji kwyisu
Juka hanshi Mwamba Kadiayi,
Wenda mwendenda Ntambwe,
Unkwata ku diboko undeja mwa kwenda mazengu,
Lwendu lwendenda ba-nkole neebe.
Bapuwa wetu,
...
a mumanya lufu lweba,
Kadi walaala abidi kubweji disaatu,
Tangila kudi lufu lweba lufuma,
Tshikudiila wamonanangana naatshi.
Taatu cyena ne tshi kukupa
Tangila kunu nkupa meena
Mwadya mvita mwena bantu
Wewa wa beena ngenyi ne beena meeji
Nyoka kafu diisu
Nansha yeeya munkatshi mwa meeba
Bapuwa Mwamba Kadiayi,
Meema weba ngashaadi ne binsonji,
Ntshiyi nansha wa kubinkupula,
Kakwena bwalu mwana’a taatu mwena Mulanga
Waya bilenga, twadya kumonangana munanga wanyi.
Geneviève Bapuwa Kembia – Mai 2007

Bavua bafunde Bible ku ntuadijilu mu tshiena Ebelu, tshiena Alama, ne tshiena Greke bia kale. Udiku lelu mujima anyi tshitupa mu miakulu mitue ku 2 600. Babadi ba Bible ba bungi kabena bumvua miakulu ya ntuadijilu ayi to, nunku Bible udibu mua kubala ngudi mukudimuna mu muakulu kampanda. Mmikenji kayi itu ikengela kulonda bua kukudimuna Bible? Ne mmunyi muvuabu bayilonde bua kukudimuna Bible wa Bible—Nkudimuinu wa bulongolodi bupiabupia?
Bamue badi mua kuamba ne: nkudimuinu wa ku muaku ku muaku 
... 
nabi. (Nsumuinu 6:34; Yeshaya 11:13) Kadi muaku umue umue wa mu tshiena Ebelu eu udi ne ngumvuilu muimpe kabidi. Tshilejilu, badi mua kuwutela bua kuakula bua “tshisumi” anyi lukunukunu ludi nalu Yehowa bua kukuba batendeledi bende anyi bua mudiye “ulomba bua bamulamate anu yeye.” (Ekesode 34:14; 2 Bakalenge 19:31; Yehezekele 5:13; Zekâya 8:2) Badi mua kuwutela kabidi bua kuleja “tshisumi” tshidi batendeledi ba lulamatu natshi kudi Nzambi ne ntendelelu wende, anyi bua mudibu babenga ‘nansha bua 
...
uamba.” Nunku, bena mu Komite wa dikudimuna Bible wa Nkudimuinu wa bulongolodi bupiabupia mbaditatshishe bua kulama nkatshinkatshi mu mushindu wa kusungula miaku ne biambilu bidi bileja tshivuabu bafunde mu Bible ku ntuadijilu ne kuepuka biambilu bidi bikole mua kubala anyi bibuitshidija tshidibu basue kuamba. Mpindieu, bantu badi mua kubalaku Bible bipepele, ne mubadi udi mua kumonaku ne dishindika dionso ne: mukenji mufundisha ku nyuma udimu mbawukudimune ne lulamatu luonso.—1 Tesalonike 2:13.

Yezu wakamba ne: ‘Badi mu nkita nebajuke.’ (Yone 5:28, 29) Anu bu muvua Nzambi musue katshia kuonso eku, bantu bajulaye nebasombe pa buloba ebu kadi bumane kulua mparadizu. (Yeshaya 65:21-25) Bantu bimpe nebikale ne bukole bua mubidi tumatuma, nebapete muoyo wa tshiendelele. Mukanda wa Nzambi udi wamba ne: ‘Bantu bimpe nebapiane buloba, nebasomb
...
gi mushindu eu. Bantu ba bungi mbafike ku diambila Bantemu ne: “Ki bulelela ebu!”
Kakuena tshintu tshidi tshipite malongesha aa to! Malongesha malelela a mu Bible aa adi atuambuluisha bua kubenga kuikala ne buôwa bua tshianana, kuikala ne bitabataba anyi kubuejakaja malu. Malongesha aa adi atuleja malu malenga adi matuindile kumpala eku, atupesha disanka ne atuleja bua tshinyi tudi ne muoyo. Yezu wakamba ne: ‘Nenumanye kabidi bualu bulelela, ne bualu bulelela nebunupe budishikaminyi.’—Yone 8:32.

Patrick Muyaya, ministre wa malu a ngumu ne malu a ngumu, ne Teddy Lwamba, ministre wa malu a mâyi ne a nzembu, bakakula bua malu adi mbulamatadi wa Suminua uteka kumpala bua kufila nzembu ne mâyi mu tshisangilu tshia kumanyisha ngumu tshivua tshienzeke mu nzubu wa kumanyisha lumu wa RTNC 3 mu Ditanu dia 18 ngondo wa muanda mutekete 2024.
Teddy Lwamba wakaleja ntatu idi bantu bapeta lelu bua mâyi, wamba ne: anu metre a dikubia miliyo 1,3 ke adibu mua kupeta, eku dijinga dia dituku dionso dia mâyi dikale metre a dikubia miliyo 3.5. Wakamba ne: mâyi adibu banua adi afumina ku mâyi a pa mutu pa buloba (80%) ne adibu bapoya (20%).
Munkatshi mua malu adibu benza bua kulama miaba idibu bangata mâyi, Lwamba udi utela: Kujingulula miaba eyi: Bua dinyanguka dia mâyi, mbimpe kuikala ne programe wa kulengeja miaba eyi yonso.
Mushindu wa kufila bintu bidi ne mushinga: Nansha mudi mâyi ne nzembu bipatuka, malu adi ambuluisha bu mudi difila PVC ne bintu bikuabu bidi bikengela kabiena bipatuka to. Tshikebelu etshi tshiakaleja patoke bienzedi ne ngenyi ya mbulamatadi bua kuakaja mushindu wa kupeta mâyi ne nzembu mu ditunga dia RDC.
Shekinah gloire Kabongo

...

...
nzeja.

“Tshidimu tshia diakalengele dia Yehowa” ki ntshidimu tshietu tshiena dîna etshi to
Ntshikondo tshidi Yehowa upetesha bantu bapuekele mpunga wa kuitaba ku dimanyisha diende dia budikadidi
Mu bidimu lukama bia kumpala, tshidimu tshia muoyo mulenga etshi tshiakatuadija pakabanga Yezu mudimu wende wa diyisha mu 29 B.B. ne tshiakatungunuka too ne mu “dituku dia disombuela” dia Yehowa, mu 70 B.B. pakabutulabu Yelushalema
Tshidimu tshia muoyo mulenga tshia matuku etu aa ntshituadije pakatekabu Yezu Mukalenge mu diulu mu 1914 ne netshiye too ne ku dikenga dinene
Yehowa udi ubenesha bantu bende ne “mitshi ya telebinta ya buakane”
Mitshi mitambe bule ya buloba bujima itu ikolela kaba kamue mu mêtu, muomu amu mutshi wonso utu wambuluisha mukuabu

Bulongolodi bwa nsangilu wa buloba bujima budi butangila malu aa bulongeshianganyi ne maalu aa mamanya
Bulongolodi ebu busunguluke buvwa bwenza mu dia 16/11/1945 pa kutangila bunyi bwa bantu bavwa bapetengana ne lufu mu mvita miibidi ya buloba bujima. Kiipatshila ka bulongolodi ebu kadi kaa kukeba ditalala, bukubi bwa bantu, mu njila wa dimanya mukanda ne mamanya mashilangane. Budi kabidi basaka matunga bwa kuteeka bwakane, mikenji ne maneeme aa muntu kakuyi kansungansungu ka dikoba dia mubidi, ntendeleelu, bulume anyi bukaji.

Dimanysha dia Basalayi ba ditunga dia Congo Wa mungalata .
Kunyima kua bivundu bivua bienzeka kuluseka lua KISHISHE ni BAMBU mu territoire Wa RUTSHURU , basalayi ba ditunga dia Congo Wa mulangata badi bajadika lelu Wa disambobo mpala wa basalayi ba ditunga dia Rwanda mu ditunga dia Congo wetu wa mungalata , balua bua kukeba bivundu ni nvita kudi bena luseka lua Nord Kivu nanangana bena TUTSI bilondeshele dimanysha ditua biala kudi Mukalenge EKENGE BOMUSA EFOMI sylvain Général Major ni mufudi Wa milubu ya basalayi ba ditunga dia Congo Wa mungalata .
Dimanysha edi didi dijadika ne nvita idi bena ditunga dia Rwanda bajule ku luseka lua KITCHANGA ni mu territoire wa MASISI idi ni kipatshila ka kukubanja disua dia bukalenga bua KIGALI .
Pananku , basalayi ba ditunga dia Congo Wa mungalata badi babikila bantu bonso ku budimu ni badi benza muabu monso bua kuluisha bena lukunga bonso badi bakeba nvita ku luseka lua Nord Kivu ni udi ujadika se, badi baluangana bua kubueja bupole kuluseka eku kua Nord Kivu.

Kadi uvua wambila bayidi bende malongesha malelela avua bu tshiuma tshia mushinga mukole. Yeye uvua bushuwa ‘mulongeshi wa patoke’ utudi katuyi mua kuelakaja.

‘Nzambi neakupule tshinsonji tshionso ku mêsu kuabu, ne lufu kaluakuikalaku kabidi, nansha madilu, nansha miadi, nansha bisama kabiakuikalaku kabidi. Malu a kale ajiminyi.’—Buakabuluibua 21:3, 4, Nkudimuinu wa bulongolodi bupiabupia.
MUDI MULAYI EU MUA KULENGEJA NSOMBELU WEBE:
TUDI NE BUA KUITABA TSHIDI BIBLE WAMBA ANYI?
Eyowa, bua malu bu mudi aa:
Nzambi udi ne mushindu wa kukumbaja malu adiye mulaye. Anu Yehowa nkayende ke utu Bible ubikila ne: “Wa Bukole Buonso,” bualu udi ne bukole budi kabuyi ne mikalu. (Buakabuluibua 15:3) Nanku udi ne bukole bua bungi menemene bua kulongolola malu bimpe pa buloba. Bible udi wamba ne: “Nzambi udi mua kuenza malu onso.”—Matayi 19:26.
Nzambi mmusue kukumbaja malu adiye mulaye. Tshilejilu, Yehowa udi ne ‘dijinga’ dikole dia kubisha bantu badi bafue.—Yobo 14:14, 15.
Bible udi wamba kabidi ne: Yezu Muana wa Nzambi wakondopa bantu bavua basama. Wakabondopa bua tshinyi? Bualu ke tshivuaye musue kuenza. (Mâko 1:40, 41) Pavua Yezu wambuluisha bantu, uvua uleja bimpe menemene mutu Tatu wende ne dijinga dia kuambuluisha bantu badi bakenga.—Yone 14:9.
Nunku tudi bajadike ne: Yehowa ne Yezu mbasue bua tuikale ne disanka matuku adi kumpala eku.—Musambu 72:12-14; 145:16; 2 Petelo 3:9.

Mireille Masangu udi wamba ne: udi ne kanyinganyinga bua kapia kadi kapete nzubu eu mu provense wa Lualaba. Ne udi upesha mêku a bansongakaji bavua bapete njiwu eyi kanyinganyinga kakole.
Tshia kumanyisha ntshia ne: mukaji wa kumpala wa ditunga dia République démocratique du Congo, Denise Nyakeru udi mujadike ne: kakuena muntu udi mufue panyima pa yeye mumane kuenza luendu mu tshimenga etshi.

... 
ijila bya Leza, bano banyema badi ba disubi kudya’bo, ino diwi dibanena’mba: ‘Petelo, languka. Tapa udye.’
Petelo’mba: ‘Mhm! Nkyadile kashā kintu kya disubi.’ Ino diwi dibanena Petelo’mba: ‘Kokita kyanena Leza’mba i kitōka bu kyadisubi.’ Kibalongeka misunsa isatu. Aye Petelo ukiipangula nshintulwilo ya bino bintu, bantu batuminwe na Konilusa abafika ku njibo kebepangula Petelo.
Petelo watūka kanena’mba: ‘Omukimba i ami. Le i kika kyomwaila?’ Bantu pa kumusapwila’mba mwikeulu wanena Konilusa akwi

hova kete.

1, 2. Ntshinyi tshidi Yehowa musue bua mêku?
YEHOWA NZAMBI ke uvua muenzeje dibaka dia kumpala. Bible udi utuambila ne: uvua muenze mukaji wa kumpala, “kuyaye nende kudi mulume.” Bua disanka divua nadi Adama, wakamba ne: “Bua mpindieu, eu ke mufuba wa ku mifuba yanyi ne musunyi wa ku misunyi yanyi.” (Genese 2:22, 23) Bualu ebu budi butuleja ne: Yehowa mmusue bua bantu badi baselangane bikale ne disanka.
2 Diakabi, bena mu mêku a bungi kabena ne disanka to. Kadi Bible udi ne mêyi adi mua kuambulu
... 
di mukaji mua kuenza yeye kayi upetangana ne bayende mu bualu kampanda? Udi ne bua kuleja lungenyi luende ne kanemu. Tshilejilu, Sala wakambila Abalahama bualu kampanda buvua Abalahama kayi musue, kadi Yehowa wakamuambila ne: “Muteleja.” (Genese 21:9-12) Bu mudi mulume muena Kristo wangata misangu ya bungi mapangadika adi apetangana ne tshidi Bible wamba, mukajende udi ne bua kumutua mpanda. (Bienzedi 5:29; Efeso 5:24) Mukaji muimpe udi utabalela bena mu dîku diende. (Bala Tito 2:4, 5.) Padi bay
...
ga. Wewe muikale mukaji, nemeka bayebe, umukokele, ne idikija tshilejilu tshia mukaji udibu batele mu Nsumuinu 31:10-31. Wewe muikale muledi, longesha bana bebe bua kunanga Nzambi. (Nsumuinu 22:6) Wewe muikale tatu, lombola dîku diebe “bimpe.” (1 Timote 3:4, 5; 5:8) Ndekelu wa bionso, nuenu bana, tumikilayi baledi benu. (Kolosayi 3:20) Vulukayi ne: muena mu dîku yonso udi mua kuenza bilema, nunku ikalayi nudipuekesha ne nulombangana luse. Bushuwa Bible udi ufila buludiki bua muena mu dîku yonso.

BUKALENGE BUA NZAMBI BUDI MUNKATSHI MUABU
NTSHINYI TSHIENZEKA PIKALA YEZU NE BUA KUSOKOLODIBUA?
Yezu utshidi anu mu Samalea anyi mu Galela. Bafalese badi mpindieu bamuebeja bua dilua dia Bukalenge, budibu batekemene ne: nebulue ne ngoma ne biondo. Kadi udi wamba ne: “Bukalenge bua Nzambi kabuena bulua bantu babumone to; anyi bantu kabakuamba ne: ‘Tangilayi apa!’ peshi ne: ‘Kuaka!’ to. Bualu monayi! Bukalenge bua Nzambi budi munkatshi muenu.”—Luka 17:20, 21.
Bamue badi mua kuamba ne: Yezu udi wam
... 
neka mu muaba munene. Tshijadiki tshia dikalaku diende mu Bukalenge budi ne bukole netshimueneke patoke kudi bantu bonso.
Pashishe Yezu wakafuanyikija malu avua menzeke kale bua kuleja muikala bantu mua kuenza malu mu matuku atshilualua wamba ne: “Anu bu muvuabi bienzeke mu matuku a Noa, ke muikalabi mu matuku a Muana wa muntu . . . Bia muomumue, anu bu muvuabi bienzeke mu matuku a Lota: bavua badia, bavua banua, bavua basumba, bavua basumbisha, bavua bakuna, bavua bibaka. Kadi dituku divua Lota
...
 nebashiye mukuabu.” (Luka 17:34) Nunku bamue nebapete lupandu, ne nebashiye bakuabu, mmumue ne: nebajimije mioyo yabu.
Bayidi bakamuebeja ne: “Mukalenge, nkuepi?” Yezu wakabandamuna ne: “Muaba wonso udi tshitalu, nyunyi ya mikanku neyidisangishapu kabidi.” (Luka 17:37) Eyowa, bamue nebikale bu nyunyi ya mikanku idi imona kule. Bayidi aba nebadisangishe kudi Kristo mulelela anyi Muana wa muntu. Mu matuku atshivua alua, Yezu uvua ne bua kupesha bayidi bende ba lulamatu bulelela budi bufila muoyo.

1, 2. Bua tshinyi bulunda bua Yonatana ne Davidi budi tshilejilu tshimpe tshia lulamatu?
DIKIMA divua nadi Davidi divua ne bua kuikala dikemeshe Yonatana bikole. Davidi wakashipa Goleyata, muntu wa mpolondo ne kutuadilaye Shaula, mukalenge wa Isalele, tatuende wa Yonatana “mutu wa muena Peleshete.” (1 Samuele 17:57) Yonatana uvua mutuishibue ne: Nzambi uvua ne Davidi, ne k
... 
abu. Kadi Olga ‘kavua upingaja bubi ku bubi’ to. Uvua wenza muende muonso bua kuikala mukaji muimpe. Uvua umulambila biakudia, umusukuila bilamba, ne utabalela balela bakuabu ba bayende. (Lomo 12:17) Pavuaku mushindu, uvua uya kumufila pavuaye uya kutangila bena mu dîku diabu ne balunda bende. Tshilejilu, pavua bayende ujinga kuya ku madilu a tatuende mu tshimenga tshikuabu, Olga wakalongolola bintu bionso bivuabu nabi dijinga bua luendu. Pashishe, pavuabu ne tshitalu mu tshitanda tshia Nzambi, 
...
natana, tudi basue kuikala ne lulamatu kudi Nzambi nansha mu nsombelu mikole. Nunku, tushalayi ne lulamatu kudi bana betu ba balume ne ba bakaji padibu batuela mâyi ku makasa. Nunku netusankishe mutshima wa Yehowa, ne bualu ebu nebutupeteshe disanka dia bungi. (Nsumuinu 27:11) Netuikale bashindike ne: neatuenzele misangu yonso tshidi tshimpe ne neatutabalele. Mu tshiena-bualu tshialonda, netumone tshitudi mua kulonga kudi bantu ba mu tshikondo tshia Davidi bavua ne lulamatu ne bavua kabayi nalu.
